Articles.Content:
**BIRTHDAY PACK!**

This pack consists mostly of american replicas but there are some beautiful surprises to wet your SparrowHawk apatite!

So, wait no longer, here it is!

(If you've never been to SparrowHawk Aeronautics go and check us out. Link is in my sig!)

(Click the images for a download of the craft!)

**Made by Burnoutforzai!**

**F-117 NIGHTHAWK REPLICA!**

[![SYLY84t.png](http://i.imgur.com/SYLY84t.png)](https://www./folder/ywowi3t7h3s14/Birthday_Pack)

**EA-6B PROWLER REPLICA!**

Now a bit from me:

This has been quite an experience these past 12 months. Leaving BrixCo with eorin then deciding that this was a great idea and having a tiny little company that I spent too much time on the op learning BBcode for xD. And it's grown into this; a bustling community with experience known to many people on the forums and having a successful youtube channel devoted to just ksp and building pretty planes. Thanks so much (I really mean this) for great times and a home on the forums.

The sparrowhawk comes with a revolutionary multifunction feature that provides the bird enhanced survivability in the wild. It camoflages the sparrowhawk from its predators, such as eagles, but lures its prey, the smaller birds. This special characteristic is the ability to transform itself into...a pine cone.

![9nwi9jE.png](http://i.imgur.com/9nwi9jE.png)

> 
> the sparrowhawk comes with a revolutionary multifunction feature that provides the bird enhanced survivability in the wild. It camoflages the sparrowhawk from its predators, such as eagles, but lures its prey, the smaller birds. This special characteristic is the ability to transform itself into...a pine cone.
> [http://i.imgur.com/9nwi9je.png](http://i.imgur.com/9nwi9je.png)

xd love it!!!
The yf-12 is missing here XD
Happy B-Day! And congrats on one year! Keep up the great work!
